import React from 'react'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; const Service = () => { const { t } = useTranslation(); return (

Service

1 {t('strategy')}

  • Creative Lead
  • Design Research
  • Competitor Analysis
  • User Journeys / Flows
  • Mind Mapping
  • Personas

2 Design

  • User Experience (UX)
  • User Interface (UI)
  • Brand Design
  • Motion Design
  • Visual Communication
  • Prototypes

3 {t('development')}

  • Front End Development
  • Content Management Systems
  • Version Management
  • eCommerce
); } export default Service;
